name: SmartMotion
0:
”Alexa, turn on Sofa Light”
”Alexa, turn off Sofa Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With our Smart Home Skill and Alexa Echo, you can interact with our Smart Home Devices, To get started, you need to register yourself using our Smart Home APP. Then use the same APP to add your devices. Each device should be given a unique name which will be used to identified the device.

When using the skill for a device, you need to tell the name of the device and an action that you would like to the device to carry out. The name of the device is that you specified when you add the device. You may change a device name using our Smart Home APP.
